Class NewState

  • java.lang.Object
    • NewState

  • public class NewState
extends Object
    Represents the latest state of the files.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) HashMap<FileObject,String> changedFiles
      Changed files as a hash-map.
      (package private) String[] columnNames
      Column names in the table.
      (package private) FileObject[] dbFilesList
      Old files' list.
      (package private) FileObject[] filesArray
      Array of latest files in their latest state.
      (package private) JTable stateTable
      A visual table to list the files.
      (package private) String[][] tableData
      Table data as a 2D array.
      (package private) DefaultTableModel tableModel
      Table's model.

    • Constructor Summary

      Instantiates a new state.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void calculateDifference()
      Calculate difference in files' sizes.
      void createTable()
      Creates the table; updates files' objects properties, fill array of files' data, calculate difference in size, update list.

      Fills file-data array with size and time of file.

      Update files' properties from disc.

      Update changed files list, with the type of change.
